name: News Website UI and Presentation for Opportunists
description:
A news article website for beginners in UI. There's also a presentation for job seekers out there in UI or UX to effectively and minimally present their work to the Hiring Managers. Cheers!


Sometimes I draw concepts. Collected a few to share with society. I will add new concepts here from time to time.
